etymology.description: Depicts three small dots arranged symmetrically to represent something small
etymology.interpretation: The character 小(xiǎo, 'small') uses three small strokes to symbolize size or quantity, visually capturing the essence of 'smallness'.

examples.chinese: 这个小猫很可爱(這個小貓很可愛)。
examples.english: This small cat is very cute.

examples.chinese: 这座小桥横跨河流(這座小橋橫跨河流)，连接两岸(連接兩岸)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè zuò xiǎo qiáo héngkuà héliú, liánjiē liǎng àn.
examples.english: This small bridge spans the river, connecting both banks.

examples.chinese: 请给我一小杯水(請給我一小杯水)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī xiǎo bēi shuǐ.
examples.english: Please give me a small cup of water.
